archimate:Product.name: Popoto.js
archimate:Product.documentation: http://www.popotojs.com/ Popoto.js is a JavaScript library built with D3.js designed to create interactive and customizable visual query builder for Neo4j graph databases. The graph queries are translated into Cypher and run on the database. Popoto also helps to display and customize the results. An application is composed of various components, each one can be included independently anywhere in a web application. It just need to be bound to a container ID in an HTML page and the content will be generated automatically.
